summary: A behind-the-scenes look at Moscow's prestigious Bolshoi Theatre as it's rocked by an acid-attack scandal in 2013.
cast: Maria Allash|Andrei Budberg|Anastasiya Meskova|Roman Adamov|Sergei Filin|Boris Akimov|Maria Alexandrova|Pavel Dmitrichenko|Yury Zaretsky|Nikolay Tsiskaridze|Vladimir Urin|Dmitry Medvedev|Grigori Zaslavski|Anatoliy Iksanov|Alex Kolton
title: Bolshoi Babylon
